title: LG Nexus 5 and Huawei Nexus 6 specs tipped in new leak | Trusted Reviews
description: ![nexus]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * There’s also a mention of a [USB-Cport](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/usb-type-c-everything-you-need-to-know), which is a new USB standard that offers improved transfer speeds anda reversible insert, just like Apple’s Lightning cables.https://twitter.com/statuses/631388074946228224The Huawei Nexus 6 is also tipped to feature a metal body, which is anincreasingly popular material for smartphones as shown by the [iPhone 6Plus](https://www.trustedreviews.com/iphone-6-plus-review) and the [HTC OneM9](https://www.trustedreviews.com/htc-one-m9-review).The screen is rumoured to be 5.7in in size, which is a little smaller thanlast year’s 5.96in [Nexus 6](https://www.trustedreviews.com/nexus-6-review).Once again, the fingerprint sensor and USB-C port will be new additions toGoogle’s Nexus program.**SEE ALSO:[Best Android Smartphones2015](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best-android-phones-1_round-up)**Unfortunately, Google hasn’t confirmed any of these details, so we’ll have totake this entire leak with a pinch of salt.However, we might not have long to wait, as the search giant usually unveilsits yearly Nexus handset in autumn.**Check out our smartphone group test video below:**
